typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	hashVal as string,
	TargetID as string,
	hashDiff as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> DataVaultSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HUBSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SATSource
DataVaultSource derive(HKey = toString(sha2(256, byName($hashVal))),
		LoadDateTime = currentDate()) ~> hashKeys
hashKeys, TargetHubKey exists(hashKeys@HKey == TargetHubKey@HKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NewRows
HUBSource derive(HKey = toString(byName($TargetID))) ~> TargetHubKey
InsertHubRows select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name==$hashVal)),
		each(match(name=='HKey'),
			replace($$,'HKey',$TargetID) = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> NewHubRecords
hashKeys, TargetSatKeys exists(hashKeys@HKey == TargetSatKeys@HKey
	&& hashKeys@LoadDateTime == TargetSatKeys@LoadDateTime,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SatRowsExist
NewRows alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> InsertHubRows
SatRowsExist alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> NewSATRecords
NewSATRecords select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name=='HKey'),
			replace($$,'HKey',$TargetID) = $$),
		each(match(name=='hashDiffValue'),
			replace($$,'hashDiffValue',$hashDiff) = $$),
		each(match(name!=$hashVal))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
SATSource derive(HKey = byName($TargetID),
		LoadDateTime = toTimestamp(byName('LoadDateTime')),
		hashID = byName($hashDiff)) ~> TargetSatKeys
NewHubRecords sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> HubLoad
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2) ~> SATLoad
